name: codelab-bootstrap
description: use nodemon to watch changes on md file, rebuild codelab on saves

scripts.build:
npm run merge-md-files && ./claat export -o dist index.md && sed -i "" -e "/body/i\\
<link rel=\"stylesheet\" href=\"css/style.css\">" dist/index/index.html
scripts.build_windows: npm run merge-md-files && ./claat export -o dist index.md && (echo ^<link rel="stylesheet" href="css/style.css"^>) >> dist/index/index.html
scripts.serve:
nodemon --watch pages/5_inputFieldsAndStates.md --watch pages/6_networking.md  --exec 'npm run merge-md-files && ./claat export index.md && sed -i "" -e "/body/i\\
<link rel=\"stylesheet\" href=\"css/style.css\">" index/index.html && http-server index'
scripts.serve_windows: nodemon --watch pages/5_inputFieldsAndStates.md --watch pages/6_networking.md  --exec 'npm run merge-md-files && ./claat export index.md && (echo ^<link rel="stylesheet" href="css/style.css"^>) >> index/index.html && http-server index'
scripts.merge-md-files: cat pages/1_setup.md pages/2_agile.md pages/3_buttonsAndScreens.md pages/4_navigation.md pages/5_inputFieldsAndStates.md pages/6_mvvm.md pages/7_networking.md pages/recap.md > index.md
